channel.title: CVE Feed for Avirtum -- iPages Flipbook For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-47236|2023-12-20T13:28:12.655Z -- avirtum -- ipages%20flipbook%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Avirtum iPages Flipbook For WordPress.This issue affects iPages Flipbook For WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.8.
